name: kd-course-player-client
description: JavaScript client for interacting with the Knowledge Direct course player.

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && webpack && npm run postbuild
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/kd-course-player.js -c -m -o dist/kd-course-player.min.js && uglifyjs dist/kd-course-player.angular.js -c -m -o dist/kd-course-player.angular.min.js

author: Mike McLin <mmclin@digitec.io>
